src:
Med begom pred policijo se je zaletel
Preizkus alkoholiziranosti je odklonil. Med postopkom so ugotovili, da nima vozniškega dovoljenja, avto pa je neregistriran. 
03 Nov 2019, 10:54 by A. L.
NOVO MESTO – Danes nekaj pred 5. uro so novomeški policisti ustavljali voznika osebnega avtomobila, ki njihovih znakov ni upošteval, ampak je z veliko hitrostjo odpeljal naprej. V križišču je izgubil nadzor nad vozilom in se zaletel.Preizkus alkoholiziranosti je odklonil. Med postopkom so ugotovili, da nima vozniškega dovoljenja, avto pa je neregistriran, zato so mu ga zasegli.Vozniku očitajo štiri kršitve zakona o pravilih cestnega prometa, tri kršitev zakona o motornih vozilih, kršitev zakona o voznikih in kršitev zakona o obveznih zavarovanjih v prometu, so sporočili iz PU Novo mesto.
text:
He escaped while escaping from the police
He refused the alcohol test. During the procedure, they were found not to have a driver's license and the car was unregistered.
03 Nov 2019, 10:54 by A.L.
NEW PLACE - Just before 5 a.m. today, police officers in Novo mesto stopped a passenger car driver who ignored their signs but drove forward with great speed. At the intersection, he lost control of the vehicle and collapsed. During the process, they found that he did not have a driver's license and the car was unregistered, so he was seized. The driver was charged with four violations of the Road Traffic Law, three violations of the Motor Vehicles Act, a violation of the Motor Vehicles Act and a violation of the law on compulsory road insurance , according to the Novo mesto Police Directorate.
